original_text: Nobody lives in the cities of Aroer. Sheep and goats can safely go there to eat. They can lie down there and nobody will chase them away.
korean_text: 아로엘의 성읍들이 버림을 당하리니 양 무리를 치는 곳이 되어 양이 눕되 놀라게 할 자가 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Nobody lives in the cities of Aroer
Sheep and goats can safely go there to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 양과 염소는 안전하게 그곳에 가서 풀을 먹을 수 있고

sentences.original_text: and nobody will chase them away
